content.detailedDescription: My shoes i cried my shoes..They just smiled at me ...You wont need shoes where were going ,,, all hail rob they cried in unison... which was wild because they had no mouths...Thats when the big one put the crown on my head and also knighted me...You will rule the universe from earth i was told starting jan 21 2012..At 7 o clock on da dot ..Ok i yelled ..Trying to startle them..No luck ...Soooo thats when i went for his ray gun ...I got off two shots hoping to start an intergalactic battle but my plans were foiled...Yep you guessed it the big one took it from me...Thats when i grabbed the wheel n hit the gas....By the time they got on there feet i had my seat belt on and shaaa whump....I hit the brakes...They flew threw the window killing them all n thus stopping an all out war of the worlds.. no no no need to thank me but i got a 2001 intergalactic space ship for sale....Uses no gas...Best offer
content.summary: Object hovered then landed then beamed me aboard.Now im there god.

content.detailedDescription: I am a 65 year old male, retired naval flight officer (usn) & retired police officer. when i was about 10 or 11 years old, my brother and i were out with star charts, locating stars, constellations, planets etc. i noticed one "star" was moving. it appeared very like a star in size and brightness. just a dot of light. i would have guessed it was 3 or 4 miles distant but with no background reference or true idea of its actual size it would be impossible to say for sure. it was moving fairly slowly against the background of stars about 30 degrees above the horizon. the actual speed would, of course, be a function of it's actual distance from me. i then noticed it was changing directions almost instantaneously. it would fly  for a few seconds or a minute then take a new direction with no noticeable curve, just assume a new direction. it ended up milling around in a few degrees of sky. i remember seeing it fly in what appeared to be triangles (up & r - down & l - horizontally back to the start). i also remember numerous right angle turns, left, right, up & down and also yo-yo moves up and down. true, every thing it did would not have been impossible for a helicopter. but helicopters show both navigation lights and flashing lights. in the 1950,s a helicopter flying aerobatics at night  over oklahoma without proper lighting would be less believable than a ufo. helicopters were practically experimental back then. i remember thinking how strange it was and trying to figure out what it could be. i do not remember now how it ended. it may have "flown off" or just turned off it's light. i can't remember that at all. i mentioned this to my older brother recently and he does not remember it. i found that odd because i was duly impressed and have wondered about it for over 50 years. i would like to know how common this type sighting is. (star like, flying sharp angles). also, for the record, i have seen navy attack aircraft making dive bombing runs over lake george bomb range at night. if you are positioned so that they fly overhead, dive going away from you them climb going away, from that perspective it makes it appear to be a straight down straight up yo-yo. it looks weird. but it's easy to explain. from the side the flight path would be a u, not a yo-yo. the object in oklahoma did all this at all angles. it was not simply perspective. i am positive of that.
content.summary: Distant, single white light flying odd angles. (instant 90degree turns, etc.).

content.detailedDescription:
June 30th 7:00pm
by: j. muirhead


a group of us from http://paranormal.Meetup.Com/400/ were at the ault cemetery in ault colorado on 3rd ave on june 21st 2008 9:30 pm. 
there were 12 of us there doing a paranormal ghost investigation and saw what looked ike an odd shape going in and out of this tree at aprox.9:40pm.It was about the size of 2basket balls side by side visualy.We all thought it was a moving orb of the spirit kind or possibly a baking tin stuck in the tree as there are no lights around the tree. 
 
three people took pictures as they were getting excited about seeing a possible sprit, but i have seen this one and thought i would send it to you as i am a ghost investigator and not a ufologist or ufo investigator. 
http://photos2.Meetupstatic.Com/photos/event/7/1/9/f/highres_4589087.Jpeg

after this picture was taken we saw lots of things that looked like shooting stars and an object that went realy bright and then slowly dimmed till nothing was there at about 9:47 pm in the eastern skyline.We left at 10pm. as members send me more pictures i will send them to you.

j. muirhead 
-countess
organizer of the ncap group.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: A light dances around a tree, this is what was on camera.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were sleeping just outside my house on my trampoline one night and it was roughly 3.30am and we were just lead on the trampoline looking up at the sky as it was a perfectly clear night. i noticed a bright light that seemed brighter than the other lights and i thought it must just be a planet or something but i still thought it looked really quite close compared to lights around it. i pointed it out to my friend and he acknoledged that it looked weird. i just lead there on my back watching that one light for at least an hour, until suddenly it just accelerated at great speed. it went at least a few thousand mph but the weird thing was it went from stationary to an amazing speed instantly! after a few seconds of movment it just halted intantly then after about a second after stopping the light went out and it was just blackness in that area. i quickly asked my mate if he saw it but he was asleep. (i had my ipod on loudly and was definatly awake, i did not dream this.) i thought about what it could of been but i couldnt think of any possible solution that didn't result in it being of extraterrestrial nature of some kind.
content.summary: Bright light accelerated fast after being stationary!

content.detailedDescription:
it was a clear day as my husband and i were traveling east on hwy 26 coming back from the northern oregon coast. there were nothing but hay fields on either side of the highway and not too much traffic. up ahead i saw a fairly large silver object in the sky seeming to hover over the freeway. at first i thought it must be an aircraft that was reflecting the bright sun. it looked cigar shaped and i didn't take my eyes off of it because it seemed stange. as i watched, it became smaller and smaller and i thought that what ever it was it must be turning and fully expected to see that it was a plane but instead it simply disappeared. i searched and searched the sky for a number of minutes afterwards but saw nothing that could of been it. 
  although i was trying to discribe it to my husband as he was driving, it all happened so fast that he didn't get to see it. 
  i wondered if it was a refection off of the dash board but could not find anything that could have made it and could not re-create it. 
  i felt that the shape was like seeing the edge of a silver saucer partially revealled some how as if it had a "cloking" device, or had the capability to travel through different dimensions. the whole event only lasted 5 to 7 seconds.
content.summary: As we were traveling east on hwy 26 a silver cigar shape object appeared above the hwy

content.detailedDescription:
I didn't see the possible ufo until reviewing the hundreds of digital photographs taken over the course of one hour in a southern jackson county, mi cemetery.

i shoot with a sony cybershot dsc-h5, which is sensitive to the near-ir, and have been doing so for the past few months with a lansing-area ghost hunting group (with some success).   i visited a local cemetery for the first time to do some 'ghost fishing', i.E. go into a cemetery and shoot hundreds of digital photos in rapid succession to see if i capture anything anomolous.    

i began around 8:00pm est on 26 june 2008 and finished up shooting around 9:00pm est.   i didn't feel, see or experience anything unusual.

the only strange thing i photographed in the 500+ photos was possibly a ufo and not a ghostly apparition, mist or bright orb...The typical graveyard paranormal fare.   when i initially looked at the image, i thought that perhaps i photographed the hat of a ghost materializing...But the closer i looked at it and the more detail that photoshop pulled out of the source image, the more it appeared to possibly be a ufo.

i've attached a cropped photo with magnified detail...A full, unaltered, un-processed image can be sent if you so desire.

jw
30 june 2008
content.summary: Photographed possible ufo while shooting digital images in pre-civil war cemetery

content.detailedDescription: As i was waiting for a student to arrive at my home, i was standing outside admiring the white puffy clouds and deep blue sky behind. a comfortable temperature and beautiful day prompted me to wait outside. as i shifted my attention from the clouds to the blue sky i suddenly noticed a round silvery object travelling across the sky from south to north at a very high altitude. my first thought was that it might be a satalite however i believe the object to have been inside earth atmospere. i have over my home witnessed high flying planes( that look like planes even at high altitude), metiorites, the space station and the space shuttle passing over before dawn and on other occations and places have witnessed satalites move across the sky. the object seen yesterday had no wings or contrail and appeared to be round and silver. size of the object would be difficult to speculate though it appeared much larger in diameter than a satalite. the entire sighting lasted about 30 seconds before it was obscured by a cloud. the object was not able to be spotted beyond this time. this was the 5th event or sighting i've has in my life. the previous 4 were not reported due to just plain old fear.
content.summary: Round object travelling approx. s. to n. above my home lasting 30 seconds before disappearing behind cloud.

content.detailedDescription:
I live on a hill in goodlettsville, tn, with a large picture window facing north. while watching tv, i often watch airplanes coming into the nashville airport.
on the evening of the sighting there were high broken clouds.
it was not dark yet and the stars were not visible as yet.
suddenly a stationary very bright twinkling light appeared approximately 20 degrees above the horizon with clouds in the background. the light was visible for about 10 seconds then shot to the right at "the blink of an eye" and disappeared.
when the light appeared it was approximately 20 degrees to the right of the usual airport flight path for planes coming in from the north. air traffic that evening was very light and only a helicopter was noted flying from southwest to northeast about five minutes after the sighting.
content.summary: Brief appearance at dusk and suddenly disappeared, shooting off to the right

content.detailedDescription:
In or around the fall of 1975 in front of the boston science
museum, natalie jacobson and her camera man were there
filming a huge silver disc that had come up out of the boston
harbor behind the museum. i was there with three other friends
and there were nearly 200 other people gathered around as well,
not to mention all of the emergency vehicles. why am i having
such a hard time finding anything a,t all about the sighting. the
vessel hovered above the electrical poles for close to fifteen
minutes or even better. it took off in a super speed "z" type
pattern when it left, going in the direction of reading. men in
suits approached natalie and her camera man who were not
more than ten feet from my right shoulder, they took out the
beta tape and kept it. i have been trying to contact natalie in
the hopes that she has something to say about the incident. ; i
contacted omonosuns years ago, and they said the incident
did happen, but that was all they had to say. someone please
contact me i would like to know if there is anyone else will to
chat about the incident. raisedonraciio57@yahqo.Com


(*****it was later determined that this case occurred in the spring of 1975 ad not the fall as noted here*****)
content.summary: In or around the fall of 1975 in front of the boston science

content.detailedDescription: Traveling northbound on i-75 just north of berea, ky and i saw what looked like a long red lighted cylinder with a short blue lighted "tail" headed eastbound.  no sounds were heard from this; seemed about 3/4 mile ahead; we were traveling 70mph; never heard a landing, it seemed to be travelling at a high rate of speed, at least double what we were traveling.  i live near an international airport and never saw anything like this.  the red and blue lights looked like neon lights.
content.summary: I saw an object flying eastward and slightly downward as if going in for a landing; very fast; silent; heard no sound and no landing sound. cylindrical long horizontal red light followed by a short blue light.

content.detailedDescription: First, this happens alot but these particular days saturday and sunday night i was able to see more activity and make out that these aren't just reflection lights or lake lamps, etc.  the lights come as soon as darkness falls, but don't seem to start moving around until later around 10 or so.  i've seen the same thing repeatedly, i've already reported what i saw earlier in the month.   basically, a bright light will be hiding (not too well) in trees in property across the street and then dimmer spheres dance around in the spotlight the brighter light provides.  at first i thought they were animals, but i can't clearly make that out - what i can clearly make out are dim spheres that seem as though they are looking for something - they go in and out of focus, so i think they could be changing shape, but i can clarify the spheres for periods of time.  then lights that change color fly across the lake - i hesitated to report b/c it could be jetski lights or whatnot, but sunday night i saw clearly - these are just spheres of light and i was able to see the reflection in the water and they were so bright - no jetski for sure.  i don't think i'm the only one noticing - we just moved here so i don't want to go ask the neighbors about the "ufo's" ,but  i noticed a boat came out several times turning off it's lights and checking things out and then last night i saw the sphere go towards my neighbors boat house and then disappear...Next thing i know the neighbor is out w/ a flashlight looking for something around his boathouse.  also, way up in the sky - like a star - it seems this one dances around from place to place and blinks and dims seeming to communicate with the other lights.  the ones lower to the ground don't always stay together - they will split up and the star up in the sky will jump from place to place.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Across lake palestine - in small bay,  4 ufo's - one star-ish in sky seeming to communicate w/ 3 others that seem to spotlight lower on the ground.  the ones close to ground seem to change color.  all would dim when a boat went out to investigate.

content.detailedDescription:
My friends and i were on a walk along san juan capistrano beach. it was about 2am, if i remember correctly. we were walking up a hill to a gazebo overlooking the beach and train tracks. suddenly there was a bright flash, and it quite frankly scared the shit out of all of us. i looked up and saw at first what i thought was a firework. at first my brain didn't process what i was seeing. the short of it is that it looked like someone had just waved a sparkler in the sky. as i said, at first i thought it was a bottle rocket, but there was absolutely no sound. that, and it didn't move in a forward direction like you'd expect a rocket propelled ordinance to do. it zigzagged backwards a little bit, then did an elaborate helix as it sped off to the north (over the small bay). then, as i stared at it, the light stretched itself out into a streak that vanished into the horizon with a snap like a rubberband... and then it winked out of existence entirely.

the projectile/ufo/ whatever the hell it was had a white head. a bright oval shaped white ball of light at the front. however, unlike fireworks there wasn't any "lens flare" (a cross of light that accompanies most intensely bright lights) second, it left a trail of intensely bright magenta/red/orange light in its wake. when i mentioned the rubber band effect, the white head vanished super fast into the horizon and ducked behind a hill - while the red trail grew in intensity - and it looked like i was seeing multiple instances of an object being stretched over a great distance. when it "snapped" suddenly the trail of light closed in on the point in the horizon where the ball had vanished and suddenly the entire trail in the sky vanished. it was a pretty bright evening, nearly a full moon. there wasn't any vapor trail indicating rocket propulsion. the object felt like it was very close to us at first, but then when i stared at it i realized it was skimming along the bottom of the clouds. (the only way i could tell was that the light briefly bumped into the cloud layer during its travel) 

as i mentioned, there was no noise. absolutely none. no "pop" no explosions... and it was a very cold night. on nights that cold you can typically hear a car horn from 10 miles away on account of the density of air molecules. if it was a firework we would have heard it. 

im sending this to you guys because i'm hoping someone else saw the same thing. maybe someone can explain this. it's really been bothering me ever since.
content.summary: The event that killed my skepticism.

content.detailedDescription: I don't remember exactly when it happened, i remember i was about 10 or 11 years old so it would have been 1991 or 1992.  it was late at night and my mom sent me to the neighbor's becasue she was helping her with a paper for school (we lived in family student housing and my mom went to ut austin).  i stepped outside and looked up and saw a very large oval/saucer shaped dark metallic object floating motionless and silently above a golf course that was across the street from our apts. all i remember is seeing the object, registering what it looked like and then without any apparent reason (later this seemed really weird) i kept on going as though it were nothing noteworthy and did not look at it again.  i remember being at my neighbor's door knocking seconds later (they were just a few dozen feet away across a lawn)and only then, turning back to where i saw the craft, and nothing was there.  i didn't say anything to anyone until a little later, when i started to think about how it couldn't have been anything i know - i.E. blimp, airplane, helicopter, balloon, etc. and i told my mom.  i don't think she has ever believed me though, i was an imaginative kid, but i know what i saw, and the way i behaved doesn't sit well with me either. i would think a normal reaction would be to open the door, (i was right outside the door when i saw it) and call my mom out to see it with me, i would also think that i would have looked at it a long time - gawking - i mean it was weird!  but i didnt, i only remember going about my business - without any thoughts really....Not until later did i actually "think" about what i saw.
content.summary: Dark grey saucer shaped with red bands of light silently hovering above trees

content.detailedDescription:
After we put the kids to bed, we generally will go outside for a smoke.  
the evening in question was no different.  our land is in a wooded section of town covering a good deal of sky.  however, we can still identify jets, single, double engined planes, and an occasional satelite despite the small sphere of vision.  as well, we can see polaris in our northen sky, and other important night time sky markers on our property.  so this report doesn't come from a novice.  we observe the day and evening sky with regularity.  and there have been many times we've stood out there under the night time sky disappointed to have explained away a possible unidentified flying object.  the object was star like in appearance.  it caught my attention as it creeped up in the western sky, travelling in an easterly direction.  it moved with the approximate speed of a satelite, but the light of the object would have fit better on a low flying jet, (or even a small plane for that matter, minus the blinking lights) on its approach to land.  my first impression was that it was indeed a satelite, but it was simply moving too fast, and just too bright.  it moved deliberatly with no sound.  there is a jet highway that travels east to west over our house.  on a moon lit night, you might see its trail, but otherwise just the faint blinking lights.  and the sound will take at least six to ten seconds til its heard, rumbling like thunder in the distance.  it lumbered over our heads, and we watched it cross over the road heading towards rockland.  this object was very hard to focus on.  it was like it was simutaneously close and far away.  my feelings were that we might be possibly witnessing something significant.  i remember feeling indignant, but not fearful.  we've both tried to dismiss this happening, but have no template in normal, everyday life to match this sighting with.  the only other item of significance to this event, is that the next day we rushed our eldest son to the hospital on our physician's dire concern that what we'd thought was mononucleosis, was in fact some sort of cancer.  which it was in fact acute lymphoblastic luekemea.  as to what this object was, we've no idea.  but it certainly marks a day in our lives which we just as soon wish never happened.

sincerly,

judson todd stanley 
www.Jtsarts.Blogspot.Com
www.Thecommanmanvideoclips.Blogspot.Com
content.summary: My first sighting of an unidentifiable flying object

content.detailedDescription:
We had taken our grandchildren to mt. rushmore for vacation.  we were going to the monument from custer state park, which is a very winding and narrow road.  we made the curve (which will be shown in the pictures) and this is when we first saw the huge monument.  we were probably 2-3 miles from the parking area when i first took the pictures. being that far from the mountain while taking these pictures, we were unable to see the "objects" and of course didn't know if they made noise or not.  

please take a look at the three pictures i am enclosing.  the first picture was taken and nothing shows up.  the second picture, however, shows some unusual egg shaped object and other darker, blacker objects.  the last picture is of the second picture with an enlarged pic of the egg shaped object. maybe et just wanted a view of our "national treasure".  ���

i sent a letter to cost to cost, but i haven't seen my pictures posted there and have not heard from them.  maybe it's nothing, but i am posting the pictures here anyway.

thanks.
content.summary: Possible ufo at mt. rushmore

content.detailedDescription: While attending a graduation party in the backyard of my friends home, i was informed by a person sitting next to me to look up at the strange object.  i thought it was a ufo.  the object first rose up out of a wooded area then it hovered over the area at an altitude of about 3,000 feet.  it began to swing back and forth for about 30 sec. then it leveled out and then acceralated very fast in almost a blink of an eye upwards then disappeared out of sight. the object was about 12 feet in diameter and was a dark metalliac charcoal colored tire inner tube shape it had a clear dome on top, on the center bottom it had a continuous red strobe light.  i felt very suprised while seeing the object but somewhat reassured that there was about 35 other people with me who were also viewing the object.  the object when it shot away at increadble speed headed north toward the long island sound.  a person at the party attempted to photograph the object but the perfectly good working camera would not function.  a new set of batteries was placed into the camera thinking that the new batteries already in the camera were defective however the camera refused to function.  oncer the ufo departed the area the camera worked fine.
content.summary: Shaped like an inner tube with a clear dome on top flashing red light on bottom center

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my balcony last evening, at 9pm, looking up in the sky to the west and i thought i saw a falling star. i was speaking with my daughter who is vacationing in n.C. and told her of my observation. all of a sudden the falling star began to move upward, then to the right/left/zig zap/circular. she asked if i was on drugs... ha ha. my parents were sitting in my living room so i called them out on to the balcony to make sure i was seeing what i was seeing. we continued to watch and observed for a good hour, unsure what it was i was seeing but knew it was not something normal to the sky.  

i went inside and called it... an experience of some sort.

i woke again at 4a.M.  i looked to the sky but no longer saw the light straight ahead.  i happened to look toward the south-west and saw what i thought could have been venus, a brighter, much larger light in the sky.  dawn was approaching. 

there it was.  the image, moving around this now brighter light in a similar motion i initially observed but was now to the south-west.  i stood on the balcony a good hour, again, but now thought i saw a darkened image above the light.  the form looked cylinder or cone shaped. it was still far away but i definitely saw an image about the light. the image was moving east which meant closer to me.  
omgness. did it know i was watching?
out of nervousness... i went inside and drew the curtains.

i was speaking of my observation to my son, michael, who works in friendly's at commack, new york.  he was amazed telling me that two gentlemen walked into his store last evening between 6-7pm giving out business cards with "mufon" on it.  he did not put one in his wallet but shared the fact that they were there and asked anyone in the store to call should they see anything unusual.

so... here i am!

he is returning to work tonite and will try to locate their business card.  should he have it, i will give the gentlemen a call.
content.summary: Star like light moving in motion not consistent with that of an airplane or star

content.detailedDescription: on or about june 21st 1974 at approximately 9:30 pm my first cousin and i, both age about 13 years, were hanging out in my families driveway in my brothers cutlass convertible with the top down. i was showing my cousin how to spot orbiting satellites. as we were looking up and towards the west we were both shocked when suddenly three evenly spaced meteorites, side by side, grazed our upper atmosphere from north to south with tails that reached from approximately 50 degrees azimuth to approximately 120 degrees north.  we simultaneously looked at each other briefly then back at the sky only to be amazed by four more ufo's trailing with identical characteristics. estimated speed would be in the neighborhood of about 10,000 mps, or, or 36,000,000 mph.         believe it or not i don't care.          if any one saw what i saw 34years ago i would like to here your story.
content.shape: Bullet,  Missile,  Fireball,  Flash,  Star-like,  Unknown
content.summary: Seven meteorite like objects with long tails, in formation(3 followed by 4).

content.detailedDescription:
Between 6 and 7pm, saturday jun 28, 2008, under partly cloudy skies (no ceiling, blue sky, where no clouds present) i was looking north towards downtown houston from a point on the brazoria county side near the intersection of brazoria, fort bend and harris counties, tx, when i noticed a blurry silver/gray object high in the sky, against a clear blue sky.  my first thought was it was a planet.  the object appeared to hover back and forth, up and down slightly which quickly ruled out a planet.  after watching it for a few moments i decided it was a bird, although at a height i could not estimate, nor had ever seen a bird fly at before.  i was certain it was a bird.  i had seen it dive at one point at which i thought i saw "white" or shiny, reflective bird shaped wings reflecting off the western evening sun.  well at this point a fairly low flying southwest airlines 727 or 737 taking off from houston hobby airport heading west passed between myself and the object, i.E. the object was higher than the plane whose height i also could not estimate but high enough that i am not considered in an airport hazard zone, nor can i hear planes while i'm inside my house but they do take off and land in a pattern that takes them near my house under certain weather conditions.  much to my surprise, the object seemed to come down towards the planes altitude and them chase it off in a westerly direction.  it scared me to see what i was certain was a bird hovering almost in place suddenly accelerate to a planes speed.  the object seemed to come down in a meandering but always smooth path, then meandered behind it maintaining speed with the plane.  it then accelerated to a speed greater than the planes speed and took off in a straight line slightly northerly of the planes almost due west heading.  not to an unreasonable speed, but greater than the 737's.  
i struggled with whether to report this and would accept an explanation that it was some sort of optical illusion but decided it best to report it in case anyone else might have seen something about that time as well.
content.summary: Object spotted hovering high in place, then chases a commercial aircraft west into the distance

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving down east washington street in marion county, indiana in about 1982/1983.  my son was looking out the car window and he said "look there's a flying saucer.  i looked up, and saw it.  i hurried to the first street and pulled into a parking lot.  we sat there watching the disc, for about 5 minutes.  it was just above the tree level.  there was no noise.  it had lights underneath it, that flashed on and off.  other cars were driving down the street and did not see the disc.  one other car parked by me and watched it to.  the lights were red white and blue, or red white and green. it has been so long now, that i can't quite remember the exact colors.  it seemed like it was there for water or the electrical lines.  it finally just disappeared. i can't really remember the year also, i did call 911, and asked if anyone else had seen the ufo.  he acted, as if, i was crazy.  a few days later, there were a lot of people near muncie, indiana that seen exactly what i had saw.

janine
content.summary: Ufo in indiana

content.detailedDescription:
i am starting to get creeped out.  i go months without looking up in the sky at night and then as soon as i do - strange happenings.  last night really took the cake.  i went outside to look at the stars at about 3am.  the first objects i noticed were aircrafts.  the first one looked to be perhaps a commercial airliner.. the next one looked like it was some sort of jet but this one was leaving a trail off the back of it.  then i saw 2 airplanes come into view shortly later (10min) one after the other, they were going generally in th same direction but were in different areas of the sky.  these planes, had two amber lights on the front and that was it.  every now and then a white flash would go off, but the only steady lights on these things were the two round big amber lights that made them look like a flying automobile.

i then noticed an incredible white light as bright as the moon coming from the sky. i focused my binoculars on it but i could not tell what it was. i must have watched it for 30 minutes, which in that time, i saw more of my amber front light friends as well as a single white light, not as bright as the moon by any means, travel - steadily but not incredibly fast across the sky. - that happened twice.   one thing i noticed was how quiet these aircraft were and if i hadnt of visibly seen them i would not have heard them.  at some point after being outside roughly 15-20minutes all the neighborhood birds and bats and wildlife were going nuts.  i mean nuts.  i mean when i walked outside it was completely silent and then all of a sudden everyone was worked up.. the strange thing was for the amount of sounds around me i didnt see any birds or anything - until 1 bird swooped right in front of me on the porch, squaking away.

my husband thinks i am a nut, but he was freaked out about the wildlife too.
content.summary: Tons of activity last night in pacific northwest

content.detailedDescription: I observed an unusual, slow-moving craft leaving the atmosphere. it was either completely white or glowing. it moved very slowly, headed upwards into the atmosphere at an unusual angle and disappeared. it did not follow the curve of the horizon, and was most definitely moving away from the earth. it moved very slowly from my point of view but must have been moving very rapidly, as it seemed to be affected by atmospheric resistance. every once in a while it would wobble as if air was blowing on it. a commercial airliner passed between it and my position, and it was not as bright as this was. it was obvious that this object was far away in relation. it seemed to be shaped like a sphere or egg. the most unusual thing about it was its trajectory. i am wondering if anyone else saw it or noticed it.
content.summary: Strange craft leaving atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and myself were sitting out in the garden, when a very intense blue/white light drew our attention to the sky, so intense was the light it illuminated the clouds from inside.  the object seemed to pulse then shot off across the sky in a westerly direction at an incredibly high speed with a comet-like tail behind it (a bit like motion blur).  the object made absolutely no noise.

the weather was low level patchy clouds.  at first glance we assumed it was a shooting star but since it was so low and travelled across the sky and it also managed to illuminate the clouds it passed through we decided that it could not be a shooting star.

our location is heanor, derbyshire, england and it passed over us heading towards ripley and alfreton.  the whole sighting only lasted a few seconds but it certainly unnerved both of us.  to begin with we were surprised but this quickly turned to mild shock and trying to make some understanding of what we had actually seen.

the object passed by across the sky in a westerly direction out of our field of vision.  we seemed to not actually move to begin with, mostly through shock and then the wow factor.  the speed at which it moved at was incredible, many times faster than the jets that sometimes fly over us.  we live not too far from east midlands airport, the east midlands police helicopter landing site and we have a few local raf bases in the next county, so we are quite used to seeing and hearing various types of air craft flying above us, however, on this occasion it was something out of the ordinary.
content.summary: Very fast intense light streaking low across sky

content.detailedDescription:
I was at home sitting on my back patio watching the clouds. i noticed a dark object moving high in the sky that i thought was a very rapidly moving object or airplane. i started to watch it more closely with my binoculars set at 10x zoom.

a dark-colored traditional disk shape moving from west to east fairly fast. the disk stopped and hovered (east north east of my location) as it changed shape slowly into a shiny ovoid (possibly turning over and over or shape shifting) and back and forth. the ufo then appeared to move out of range further to the east. duration 2-3 minutes total.

this was followed by a second silver disk shape appearing due east of me and near to a jet that was flying south to north. the ufo vanished. duration 1-2 minutes total.
content.summary: Dark colored disk shape that changed into a shiny silver ovoid.

content.detailedDescription: Me, my wife, and my oldest daughter were driving east coming from shopping and we noticed 2 strange solid red lights traveling north. first i thought it was a helicopter, but it was moving to slowly , and i tried to listen for any noise coming from it , but it was silent. it was hovering slowly above the tree line about  one mile away. we thought that is was not like anything we had seen before, because the lights were solid and stacked one on top of another with a space in between and the object seemed to be very large, maybe the size of a grey-hound bus.  we turned north onto another road and then east again, moving closer to the object as the object descended downward and we lost site of through the trees. but this isnt the first time we've seen ufo's in this area , but it was the first time my oldest daughter seen what she thought was a ufo.
content.summary: Two solid red lights stacked one on top of another

content.detailedDescription: Turning on to the harvest green terrace (where i live)  noticed in corner of eye black oval moving up and down in the distance ,pulled out camera instantly thought it was a plane however no visable wings, my daughter said its a bird daddy , then it changed direction and zipped over to a diferent spot in the sky then again, then 1 zig zag then proceeded to act simalar to a plane a fly out of sight slow and controled.  approx 40 seconds of video taken
content.summary: Black oval changing direction over 4 times high speed(caught on video)

content.detailedDescription:
I submitted a ufo report to mufon in february, 2008 and was contacted by a mufon field investigator three days later.  the field investigator interviewed me for approximately 4+ hours on a saturday afternoon, approximately 2 days after he contacted me to set up an interview day and time.  

i reported seeing stars all around my home and the city i live in which would move side to side, up and down.  these star-like objects were always closer than most of the stars we are able to see with city street lights on during the evening.  i have never heard from this investigator again, so i'm sure he must have decided i was not a credible witness and there was no one else to back up what i was seeing.

i am at my wits end now because now i have light white to light blue energy orbs floating through the ceiling, walls, windows and doors of my home constantly.  they are everywhere, including my closets!  they blink tiny lights also, mostly in green, blue, white and red.  i also seem to have a new gift (if that's what you would call it)!  i can see stranger things in the sky during the day and night, such as windows opening that looks like there are silhouettes of people moving about, like in another dimension, everything being white in color against a blue sky during the day.  i am not crazy!!

i now have someone (my brother) who lives about 6 blocks down the street from me (same street) who can also see orbs on the mirrors in his house!  he says he just ignores them....Well, i've tried that but they will not leave me alone!  i actually have to go outside and run my fingers through my hair several times a day and evening and when i do that, all these energy orbs start floating away.

two weeks ago i developed a sore throat and cough which took about a week to overcome.....Antihistamines did not work!  i thought i was having an extreme allergy attack, even though i haven't had any problems for years and have lived in the same location for 18 years.

i guess i should also mention that i listed my property with a real estate agent on june 10th.  a couple of days ago, i became so congested in my head and nose as did my boyfriend.  i decided to try a differnet antihistabmine and after taking it for the second time in 24 hours which was well within the doseage limits, i became extrenely dizzy, and upon standing up, i could barely walk! this is insane! i'm still having a problem with my balance from time-to-time and since then have delveoped a problem with my right eye, which seems like something is floating in the shape of an oval.  i will be seeing my eye doctor this coming wednesday.

yesterday, my real estate agent introduced me to an agent of a prospecctive buyer and he told me his wife has been plagued with the same thing as me for the past two weeks (however, i did not mention the orbs in my house or the ufos, not stars dancing anymore, but ufo's, roaming all over the skies). 

two messages have been left on a patio table since may 31st, that were done similar to a crop circle.  i will include the pics i took with my digital camera.   

there is something very strange and now very scary to me that's going on in my area, and a further investigation needs to be done, possibly by someone who may have a special gift of seeing things differently, or possibly someone who has "remote viewing" capabilities.

i really want and need to sell my property and don't want any attention drawn to my property that could affect it getting sold, and that's why i now just reporting this to you.  i have nothing to gain and everything to lose by telling anyone about my dilemma, because my property is all i really own of meaningful value and it's my only means of survival for a retirement (unless the et's or whomever is behind this engery orb attacks take care of me first).

if someone could contact me to discuss the matter further, i would welcome the call!  you just can't imagine how much i regret ever allowing myself to become interested in looking up in the sky (especially at night) and taking pictures with a digital camera in case i could capture a ufo or some other strange phenomenon.  i guess i'm paying for it now!
content.summary: Energy orbs continuously entering my home and my head!

content.detailedDescription: We went out side to smoke a cigartte & started looking at the stars when i noticed two areas; one stated flashing many different colors. the second was a pattern of rainbow like lights flashing in a disc like pattern. both areas moved very fast to very slow at times but they moved very violently about the area. at one point off in the distance i saw one come very close to the the ground & i saw what seamed to be a beam of light shine down on the ground below. however once again the object shot off directly up toward the sky. my fiance also witnessed the entire incident. at the very end of the incident we saw a greenish blue streak shoot off right over our heads the whole incedent we could not hear a thing everything was very quite. the whole incedent lasted about an hour-hour & fifteen minutes & acured around midnight. after all the above happend i witnessed/heard a low flying helicopter also fly across the area very low to the ground heading in the same direction as the lights we saw.
content.summary: Many starnge lights & objects hovering & vearing across the sky...

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were backpacking in the emigrant basin wilderness area ca
when we noticed about bedtime that these 4 lights in the sky would go into a diamond formation and then move out of formation at tremendous speed and after a few seconds would come back almost instantly into formation. nothing i know could accelerate that fast and come to a complete stop. i did not hear a sound but my wife claims she heard a hum. they seemed to be miles off. we watched for about 20 minutes they continued to go into and out of formation, and then went to bed. at first i was thinking of going to get a ranger or something then realized how dumb an idea that was in the middle of the night. i thought about signaling with a flashlight but i decided i would not really like them to know i was there. i was kind of excited and a little scared. 
i'm guessing on the date but we didn't tell anybody for years about our sighting. we were not drinking or on drugs of any kind.
content.summary: Ufos in and out of formation

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving back to london from tonbridge wells in kent england
with a friend and my 2 kids 

we was driving along the a21 sevenoaks bypass, traveling towards the m25 and london 

it was 1055pm on the 21st of june 2008, when i noticed out of my left eye a fleet of ufos they were like a constellation of red to orange to white and back to orange colour orbs,
they were just above the horizon of the fields trees that were silueted to my left side around a hundred feet up and around 3 hundred feet away,

i said to sam my mate sitting on my left next to me,  look at that, there,

he said that's a constellation,  i said no way it's too close to the ground and look at the colour of the other stars, there white these are orangey red and white, so he laughs at me for being too quick to call it ufos.

well we hadn't got a min up the road when again on the left side of the
road in the next field along, we all saw hundreds of them, again this time
they were not only on the ground and all spread out over this field they
were hanging there just above the ground from left of the field to right,
about 2 hundred feet across this field, and what i noticed most was that
they were like getting into line and making a pillar of spiralling lights
going up around maybe 3 to 4 hundred feet into the air,  but keeping this shape of a tube or strait line of lights 

like something was slowly vacuuming them up a glass tube but not so fast,
just like a floating motion 

 

well sam said  john don't stop on the road if a car comes up from behind
they might hit you so i keep going don't stop,
well the road didn't have any hard shoulder to stop on and i had a few cars
behind me now, but i did slow down to around 20 miles an hour and the cars
behind me slowed also, there must have been around 5 or 6 cars behind me but no one seemed to mind that i had slowed my cars speed down ,no one gave me a toot on their horn, they all must have seen it too, it was like christmas lights out there, they were lighting up the hole field in this orangey red colour
i continued watching them in my rear mirror , i asked if everyone is ok and my little girl in the backseat said im scared so we just kept driving 

i wanted to stop i did have a phonecamera but didnt take any pics as i couldnt stop on the road 
 

i did see this and thay were not thai  lanterns
content.summary: Red orange orbs
